description: The Pentagon now has about 7,000 aerial drones in its inventory, compared with fewer than 50 a decade ago.
title: Drones Transform How America Fights Its Wars
title_page: Drones Transform How America Fights Its Wars - The New York Times
text: An increase in unmanned drones is transforming the way America fights its wars. At left, Lt. Greg Sundbeck positioned an experimental Micro-Air Vehicle in the test chamber of the indoor flight laboratory at Wright-Patterson Air Force Base in Ohio.
